articles.description: The move to cryptocurrencies comes as the Russian rouble fell for a third straight day in Moscow trading on Wednesday as fighting in Ukraine intensified.
articles.content:
Bitcoin trading in the Russian rouble went into overdrive when the Ukraine invasion began last Thursday. Photo: Jakub Porzycki/NurPhoto via Getty Images

articles.title: BharatPe founder Ashneer Grover siphoned off money, Indian startup says - TechCrunch
articles.description: BharatPe co-founder Ashneer Grover, a Shark Tank India host, engaged in "extensive misappropriation of company funds" and "siphoned [off] money," the startup said.
articles.content: BharatPe co-founder Ashneer Grover and his relatives engaged in “extensive misappropriation of company funds” and “siphoned [off] money,” the Indian fintech startup said, citing a review by independe… [+3945 chars]

articles.title: FDA begins court-mandated release of thousands of pages on Pfizer's Covid-19 vaccine review - Endpoints News
